description: An idle brick breaker game where players click on bricks to destroy them and earn money, which can be spent on purchasing balls to automate brick breaking. The game features a grid of numbered bricks, a money counter, and upgrade buttons.
expectedControls: Mouse clicking on bricks to destroy them and on UI buttons to purchase upgrades

inputSchema.content: This is a mouse-only clicker/idle game. Players interact by clicking on bricks in the game grid to destroy them and earn money. Money can be spent by clicking on ball purchase buttons ($ at top-left). The UPGRADES button provides access to permanent upgrades. The game is entirely mouse-driven with no keyboard controls required.

loadingIndicators.description: Game canvas element should be visible and rendered
Level indicator should be visible in the UI
Ball counter should be visible in the UI

successIndicators.description: Money counter (top-right) should increase when bricks are clicked
Bricks should visually change or disappear when clicked
Ball counter should show '0/50 BALLS' initially and update when balls are purchased

testingStrategy.instructions: Provide *PRECISE COORDINATES* for clicks. Focus on clicking numbered bricks to destroy them and earn money. After earning money ($ top right) click on the corresponding ball purchase button ($ top-left) to buy a ball. Clicking the UPGRADES button (top-right) may reveal additional upgrade options. Prioritize clicking in the center of low-numbered bricks as they are easier to destroy and provide immediate feedback.
